SobreMi.formacion: I completed the Henry bootcamp, gaining over 600 hours of hands-on practice and learning in web and mobile development. During this time, I mastered technologies such as JavaScript, React, Node.js, Express, Redux, HTML, and CSS. 🌱 I am currently pursuing a Web Development Technician degree at the National University of Entre Ríos 🎓, and I am proficient in tools like TypeScript, Next.js, React Native, and MongoDB.
SobreMi.experiencia: With over 2 years of experience, I’ve worked on developing web and mobile applications, creating robust and scalable solutions. On the backend, I leverage Node.js and Express to build efficient APIs. 🔧
SobreMi.equipo: I’m accustomed to collaborating in multidisciplinary teams and remote environments, using Scrum and DevOps practices to enhance project security and testing. I also use GitHub and Jira for agile task and project management. 🛠️

Experiencia.text: I work for a company in the healthcare industry that uses a cryptocurrency called MDCx. Within this company, I am a member of the mobile app development team, specializing as a full-stack developer. Our primary focus is to create a telemedicine application that allows users to access medical services remotely. In my role, I am responsible for both front-end and back-end development, ensuring that the application is user-friendly, secure, and meets the high standards required in the medical field.
